name: Niwa
description:
Plant flowers, fight with weed and experience the cycle of life.

Controls:

  • Left/Right arrow - Move around
  • B - Pick up/swap/drop an item
  • Space - Use an item

Created during a 48H game jam No Fun II: Queer to Play with the theme of "Something completely different".

We were a team of four:

  • Hafi - Art ( https://www.instagram.com/hafi_art/ )
  • Matěj - Sound/music/programming ( https://www.instagram.com/mates_hlozanek )
  • Lukáš - Animation ( https://www.instagram.com/luciangracik )
  • Pohy - Programming ( https://www.instagram.com/pohyart )

Source code: https://github.com/pohy/niwa
